rev.desc.rev.desc: update start panel, handle Service Catalog specially

tableAccess in $L.env usage behavior changes. Legacy $L.env uses the table for specific module, for e.g., smenv. But in PD the $L.env uses table tableAccess directly. So we add a field tableAceess in file tableAccess to refer to itself to make sure the legacy code works well.
Process Designer secRole set to "When assigned to workgroup" does not function correct
QCRQ1E63575 - Adding security folder query to correct tables in secRoleBasedAccess
Change:Changed the panel type from process to a loop panelPanel: set.folders2
Change:Changed the panel type from loop to a process panel
Removed security folder code as it will not be used in first release.
Added the following line in set.auth panel:
if nullsub($G.folderEntitlement, false) then ($L.void=mandant(3, name in $L.env, {$L.name}))
Hua: replace rad loop with javascript call

descript.descript: update start panel, handle Service Catalog specially

tableAccess in $L.env usage behavior changes. Legacy $L.env uses the table for specific module, for e.g., smenv. But in PD the $L.env uses table tableAccess directly. So we add a field tableAceess in file tableAccess to refer to itself to make sure the legacy code works well.
Process Designer secRole set to "When assigned to workgroup" does not function correct
QCRQ1E63575 - Adding security folder query to correct tables in secRoleBasedAccess
Change:Changed the panel type from process to a loop panelPanel: set.folders2
Change:Changed the panel type from loop to a process panelRemoved security folder code as it will not be used in first release.
Added the following line in set.auth panel:
if nullsub($G.folderEntitlement, false) then ($L.void=mandant(3, name in $L.env, {$L.name}))
Hua: replace rad loop with javascript call
